sources.title: Harlem Is Heaven (1932) BILL "BOJANGLES" ROBINSON
sources.description:
BLACK HISTORY MONTH
Stars: Bill Robinson, Eubie Blake, Anise Boyer
Writer/Director: Irwin Franklyn

This pre-Code crime drama/musical features an all African-American cast including Bill "Bojangles" Robinson in his first leading screen role, plus some of the top entertainers of the period from Harlem's famous Cotton Club.

metadata.Plot: The director and star of a Harlem theater troupe puts his feelings aside to help unite two lovers.
metadata.Actors: Bill Robinson, Eubie Blake, John 'Spider Bruce' Mason
